reviews.review: Que coisa incrível..... Melhor que esse jogo, só o segundo dele....
It's a whole different game. Think portals.

Un juego de puzzles bastante ligero, muy divertido y sin duda obra maestra de los videojuegos.
Muy buen juego divertidisimo, aunque algo corto porque me lo acabe en menos de tres horas sin contar los niveles de bonificacion pero igualmente recomendado<3

I wish there was a 'thumbs sideways' button.

I really liked this game. The concept is great. The graphics are decent enough. The gameplay is challenging and fun.

There's only one problem. I finished it in 2 hours. And you could say I can go back through it and get all the achievements, but can I be bothered? No.

I got this in the summer sale for £1.74. Purely based on the amount of time I spent on it, I'd say it's not worth that price. And £6.99 is just absurd. 

If you're rich and want a few hours of fun: Recommended.
If you care about your money: Not recommended.
Amazing puzzle game! Really funny! Really recommended!
Вот именно в эту игру должны играть дети 6 лет, а не в digger online и warface

Es ist wirklich eins der besten Spiele auf Steam! Die 9,99 € sind es Wert! Der einzige Grund warum ich es mir nicht kaufen würde, ist dass die Story sau kurz ist :( Dafür gibts ja aber noch Portal 2 :D

10/10
Make one portal in front of you and one portal behind you and enjoy running forever and ever!!!

[h1]Guía de cómo hacer una obra maestra de 5 horas[/h1]

Corto, barato y sin duda, uno de mis juegos favoritos. Tiene una historia de lo más oscura, además de plantear preguntas que no se resulven hasta Portal 2. Aún así, es un juego obligatorio al menos una vez.

[b]11/10[/b]

An excellent game, and an excellent series. If you want to have a somewhat short, but still rather tricky and ingenuitive puzzle game, Portal has it all. The constant dialogue by GLADoS is also hilarious, preventing the player from becoming bored; I was thoroughly entertained all the way through.

Not only that, but the music...my god, the music. I just love it; especially the credit song. Perfect reward for a perfect game.

If you want both this AND Portal 2, the Bundle is the best way to get both; unlike some other Bundles (like the Half-Life 1 Bundle, which also contains Team Fortress Classic for whatever reason), this Bundle only contains the two games, at a discounted price. WORTH IT. If I could, I'd give this game, Portal 2 and the Bundle 5 stars, but it only allows 1 thumbs up. Shame.
非常不错的游戏，值得一玩
I do not understand how to work this game. There are no instructions, at least none that I could find. I am in a bathroom. That's it. Would like to know what the goal is.
Great puzzler!

After hearing about the cake being a lie all these years I never actually knew why until I /finally/ played this game. Now I can say the cake is a lie and know why it is.

Portal's a wonderful game and I don't regret a single moment playing it. It has great mindbending puzzles and a somewhat dark atmosphere. At least I felt that nearing the end of the game and I knew it wasn't gonna be good news. 

The music is fun, the puzzles are fun, the game is great. I'd recommend it to anyone, even if they're late getting into Portal and playing it like I was.

10/10 would lie about cake again.
Realistically, people would use portals to have sex with themselves.

The best puzzle game of all time. Short and sweet, darkly funny, creative, innovative, original and as good if not better than the game it was a spin off of? Yeah, that's Portal. It's also short and sweet. I don't play or enjoy it as much as Half-Life 2 but that's preference as there is no denying it's quality.
One of the best games for the PC. Portal 2 fans will want to play this game as both a flashback, and an extra-challenging puzzler.

I loved this game the humor and the sinister easter eggs behind it but the one problem is the replay value, there is none, once you complete the story and beat the challenge test chambers there's nothing left but otherwise it's a great game and there's nothing better than beating each test.
Good game with amazing story line, would recommend to all types of players.
Best game ever perfect balance of comedy and gameplay not to big ether so you can play it in one siting I play it once every year anyways just get it it is in my opinion it is a perfect game.
Although it took some getting used to, this game was incredibly fun!  It's different from practically every other game I've ever played!  So worth it!
the first playable meme

I just finished this game for the second time, it was still just as fun.
The game isn't extremely long, although it should keep you busy for at least a couple of days. Maybe longer if you're stuck at a puzzle.

The puzzles are fun, but what is really excellent is the humor and sarcasm used in this game.
I just beat the game for the second time. First time on Windows, now on Linux. Last time I tried, it crashed somewhere at the beginning of the game. But right now, I did not have any problems at all. Runs smooth on Linux. And doesn't look all too bad either, despite its age.

Definitely recommended, I feel this one is a classic.
one of the classics, a must buy.

Best game I've ever played and had to beat it in one sitting. If you like puzzles, want to feel smart, and witty funny humor, with a touch of sadness, oh and a great villian, get this game! QQ its over! Time to download PORTAL 2! I'm sold for life on this game, even the CREDITS were good!
Portal é um jogo muito bom o unico defeito dele é ser tão curto em 2 horas consegui acabar a campanha dele, mas é um jogo que vale a pena ter.
Tutto quello che si può dire su questo gioco è stato già detto. Semplicemente un classico che ha fatto nascere un fenomeno di culto.

Não acredito que demorei tantos anos para jogar um jogo desses, ainda mais considerando a hype que ele teve no lançamento e os posts no tumblr na época em que o 2 saiu, mas cá estou, jogando um FPS, algo que eu normalmente não gosto, e adorando!

Preciso muito jogar o 2 agora, mas lá se vão mais alguns anos...
The cake is a lie, (best puzzle game of all time btw) 9/10, just a little two short for 2 and 1/2 hours.
Incredible. 11/10
这是一款 很好的解谜类游戏！传送门的概念十分吸引人，关卡的设计十分合理，由易到难，让人不知不觉就玩进去了。整体流程不长，但如果连续玩的话可能会头晕，因为画面转化有点乱，习惯就好一点。
非常有趣的游戏，每一关都充满挑战，但是每当完成后就觉得十分的满足，挑战关卡太难了（哭脸，机器人的声音也好萌~
Best "What the fuck am I supposed to do!?!?!" simulator i've ever played!

《传送门》无疑是一款拥有优秀创意的游戏，看了部分开发者的留言，为这群大学生的创意点赞。
这是橙盒的附加游戏，我是为了玩半条命入的橙盒，当时并没有在意这款游戏。
然而我玩了几分钟，就被这款很有特色的游戏吸引住了。花了几个小时通关，看到了同样富有创意的通关界面。
虽然游戏画面比较单调，剧情也不是那么太明显。但是传送门本身的创意，就已经值得入手这款游戏了。
再次为这群大学生们的创意点赞。

I've always loved this game. I hada nonsteam version. but i bought it. valve deserves it. 


1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000/10
I JUST LUV IT!

But what about a third one?
Great game, i spend some time on it and for me it's one of the best games EVA

Portal est un sorte d'ovni vidéoludique qui m'a énormément plu.
Un puzzle game avec une façon de jouer complètement nouvelle et différente, une ambiance sympathique, un humour très noir et un mix de tout ça qui donne un jeu exceptionnel.
Même si les graphismes peuvent paraître vieillots, je conseille ce jeu pour tout le reste car c'est une perfection. Très peu de jeux dans le monde vidéoludique m'ont fait cet effet.
A recommander d'urgence aux fans de puzzle game !!

Ostrożny i niedługi w rozgrywce eksperyment. Prekursor genialnego Portal 2.
Mimo że grafika już trąci troszkę starością, warto zagrać jako wstęp do sequela.
Polecam również rozgrywkę z komentarzem autorów.

Не согласен с многими мнениями. Я считаю портал и портал 2 отдельными играми. Единственное, что их объединяет, так это сюжет. Все остальное поддано совершенно по разному. 

Портал 2 на фоне с порталом кажется забавным и не серьезным, считая диаологи и историю нашего героя. Отличается изменениями в графике и текстурках, ну уже не тот серьезный портал, где нас пытались сжечь в печи. 

Вроде в плане сюжета, считая все модификации выигрывает первая часть, потому что мы имеем очень много деталей, которые можно раздумывать многое время. Во второй части идет только продолжение истории и информация о старом комплексе.

Первая часть ужасна в плане геймплея, идея неплоха, но действительность не оправдать. Поведение переходов через порталы устроено реалистично, но начинает бесить. И если во время игры в первую часть ты еще справляешься, то при прохождении модов у тебя бомбит.
This is geek cultural literacy right here. Seriously, play it already.
simple is the best

Gran juego : entretenido, puzzles, humor y lo creditos son epicos. xD
Es corto, lo pase en 3 horas pero vale la pena comprarlo.
Envolvente, Angustiante, Genial... Poucas horas aplicadas com mais de 10% do cérebro...

A truly smart puzzle game that manages to both excite and innovate. Requires some thought and trial and error in order to solve its gameplay but leaves the player having had a rewarding experience. Not a game I felt I truly appreciated until the end, yet something both puzzle and non-puzzle fans alike should pick up.

Portal is the charming puzzle game that kicked off the series with an awesome story, fun gameplay, and mind-bending puzzles. The game isn't very long but believe me when I say that it's not like any other game you've played before. Along the way, you will uncover the secrets of Rat Man, GLaDOS, and the facility that the game takes place in. Equipped with only a gun that makes two holes to get from one place to another, you must find your way through a dozen of test chambers. Portal can be considered a classic in puzzle games, and once you play the first, you'll want to play the second as well.

Un muy buen diseño de niveles, recomendable para entrenar la logica. Este juego no busca ser competitivo, sino que quiere que los jugadores se superen a si mismos en cada uno de las pruebas.

Un sistema muy innovador el uso de los portales, se sale de la linea del tipo de juegos que quiere impactar con efectos especiales y escenas atractivas.

A decir verdad es muy basico, contiene pocos elementos, pero todo esta muy bien utilizados para pasar horas y dias entretenido.

Im Sale noch immer kaufens- und spielenswert.
___________

To cut a long story short: 
Zeitloser Klassiker. Deutlich einfacher als der zweite Teil, auch von der reinen Levelanzahl kürzer und analog dazu etwas story-ärmer. Wenn man das Spielprinzip noch grob im Kopf hat, in 2 Stunden [ohne Bonuskarten] entspannt durchspielbar; die Story hat dabei kurzweiligen Witz und ist für den zweiten Teil empfehlenswert.
Die verwendete Source Engine ist quasi zeitlos und läuft auf so ziemlich jedem System flüssig auf max. Einstellungen. 

Valve war und ist eben kein EA.
There is cake.

Worth every cent. It shouldn't take long to beat, but it's innovative and it has an astounding ending. You'll be listening to the song that plays in the credits afterwards, I promise you. Definitely buy.

Es el primer análisis que hago porque creo que este juego lo merece de verdad. Justo ahora me he acabado el modo historia, que aunque se me ha hecho corto (2 horas) me lo he pasado en grande. Ahora me tocan los mapas avanzados que quizás me den más horas de juego. A simple vista puede parecer un simple juego de portales pero, si te fijas en la gran cantidad de detalles, los textos en la paredes, lo que va diciendo la I.A... lo convierte en un gran juego. LO RECOMIENDO a absolutamente todo el mundo. 

9/10

Old but gold: A really entertaining game for people who like a bit of variety and a few difficult puzzles. 
I bought it in a pack (together with Portal 2) whilst it was on offer. If you love extremely fancy graphics, please consider that this game is almost 8 years old... ;) I have to deduct a point though because of the current price: 10 quid for a rather old game that can be finished within a day (I did it in two) is too much for my taste.
